Hi, I'm Tomasz

I am a front-end engineer and team lader of the team responsible for offer page and navigation components at Allegro. Web enthuasiast and occasional music creator. If you want to contact me, you can easily find me on Twitter, GitHub or Linkedin.

My projects

    Command Line Tool for CrUX Rest API

  • crux-dashboard

    Crux Dashboard

My photos

My music

From time to time I create music using DAW, MIDI software instruments, MIDI keyboard and occasionally also my voice. I will probably never consider any of my tracks finished, but you can enjoy the latest drafts if you like.
